title: Lesson 20
paragraph: Clothing helps people stay comfortable and show their style. Different materials, designs, and accessories let individuals express their personality through what they wear every day.

words.meaning: a piece of clothing worn on the upper body
words.example: He wore a clean shirt to the meeting.

words.meaning: a short coat worn for warmth or style
words.example: She put on a jacket before going outside.

words.meaning: a piece of clothing that covers the body and legs
words.example: The dress looked beautiful in the sunlight.
He wears jeans almost every day.

words.meaning: something worn on the head for style or protection
words.example: The hat protected her from the sun.

words.meaning: a long piece of cloth worn around the neck
words.example: He wrapped a scarf around his neck.
Her shoe was very comfortable for walking.

words.meaning: a warm knitted piece of clothing for the upper body
words.example: He wore a thick sweater in winter.

words.meaning: a small bag sewn into clothes for carrying small items
words.example: She put her keys in her pocket.

words.meaning: a piece of jewelry worn around the neck
words.example: The necklace sparkled under the light.

words.meaning: special clothes worn by members of an organization
words.example: Students wear a uniform to school.

words.meaning: lenses in frames worn to help you see
